summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, authorizing acceptance of the renewal of Utility Franchise No. 1817 from the State of Washington, Department of Transportation for the operation and maintenance of an existing 6-inch waterline on a portion of SR 167 (Rainier Ave.) located in Government Lot 3 of Section 1, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W.M., in King County, Washington.
